entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
